_header: Every freeman hath to be hend
_description: An exhortation to liberality — four monorhyming lines

BodRawC22.Transcription:
Eueriche freman hath to ben hendefor to be large of þat him
                    crist sendeþan it es al ydon that cume to þe uendena haues
                    naman of þis werld bot gnedeliche his Lenge
